    • addPlayer

      public String addPlayer(String name, String idNick)
      This method allows the user to add a player to the array of players.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the new player
      idNick - The identification of the new player
      Returns:
      msj Shows the user if the player was added or not.

    • addLevel

      public String addLevel(int idLevel, int scoreNeccesary, int totalTreasures)
      This methow allows the user to add new levels in the array levels
      Parameters:
      idLevel - level this is an identification for the level that will be from 1 to 10 because the level 0 is already intialized.
      scoreNeccesary - it will be the point that the player has to get for pass the next level.
      totalTreasures - for level the user most type how many treasures the level would have.
      Returns:
      msj is a message that shows if the level was added or not.

    • hasEmptypos

      public boolean hasEmptypos()
      This method will help us to search for an empty position and allows the method addLevel and addPlayer add the object in the firste empty space
      Returns:
      A boolean that indicates the availability in the arrays.

      Returns:
      The player that was found.

      public int searchLevelByIdent(int idLevel)

      Returns:
      the level object that was found.

    • addEnemyToLevel

      public String addEnemyToLevel(String idEnemy, int typeEnemy, int giveScore, int takeScore, int idLevel)
      This method allows the user to add a enemy of a type to the levels.
      Parameters:
      idEnemy - the name of the new enemy
      typeEnemy - the type enemy "ogro, boss, magical, abstract"
      giveScore - the score that the enemy will give if the player kill it
      takeScore - The score that the enemy will take if hits the player
      idLevel - the identification of the level where the enemy will be added.
      Returns:
      A message if the level was added or not.

    • addTreasureToLevel

      public String addTreasureToLevel(String nameTreasure, int idLevel, String urlTreasure, int plusTreasure, int treasureForLevel)
      This method allows the user to add treasures to levels.
      Parameters:
      nameTreasure - name of the new treasure
      idLevel - the identification of the level where the enemy will be added.
      urlTreasure - the url image of the treasure
      plusTreasure - the score that the player will get if obtains it
      treasureForLevel - how many treasures will be added in a level.
      Returns:
      A message if the treasure was added or not.
